subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cyberattacks and Hackers
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The American cyclist Floyd Landis was convicted by a French court for his role in hacking into the computers of the anti-doping lab that caught him cheating at the 2006 Tour de France.
snippet: The American cyclist Floyd Landis was convicted by a French court for his role in hacking into the computers of the anti-doping lab that caught him cheating at the 2006 Tour de France.
